references.paper_title: Implicit regularization in deep matrix factorization
references.reason: This paper analyzes the implicit regularization effect in deep matrix factorization, which provides theoretical support for using low-rank approximations in deep learning models.

references.paper_title: Learning deep linear neural networks: Riemannian gradient flows and convergence to global minimizers
references.reason: This paper establishes convergence guarantees for Riemannian gradient flows in deep linear networks, offering theoretical insights into the optimization of low-rank models.

references.paper_title: A rank-adaptive robust integrator for dynamical low-rank approximation
references.reason: This paper introduces a robust and efficient numerical method for dynamical low-rank approximation, which is directly relevant to the training algorithm proposed in the main paper.
This foundational paper lays the groundwork for dynamical low-rank approximation, upon which the main paper's method builds.
